scripts.compile:css: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-import sass/ -o ./ && stylelint '*.css' --fix || true && stylelint '*.css' --fix
scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../_rus.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map
